definition: arteries and veins/vein (on a leaf, insect wing etc)
to open up/to spread/sheet of paper/classifier for flat objects, sheet/classifier for votes

sentences.english: Does crossing legs cause spider veins?
sentences.chinese: 交叉双腿会导致静脉曲张？

sentences.english: Varices were present in half of the patients.
Lesions, often can be multiple concurrent varicocele.
sentences.chinese: 病变可多发，常并发精索静脉曲张。

sentences.english: Conclusion EVLT is effective for patients with superficial varicosities of the lower extremities.
sentences.chinese: 结论腔内激光治疗下肢浅静脉曲张疗效可靠。

sentences.english: If you have varicose veins, consider wearing elastic support hose.
sentences.chinese: 如果患了静脉曲张，可以考虑穿弹力护腿袜。

sentences.english: Also, it can prevent old people from several diseases such as apoplexy, varicosity and etc.
sentences.chinese: 同时，可预防中风及静脉曲张等多种老年疾病。

sentences.english: So in the varicose socks can play a role in mitigation.
sentences.chinese: 所以穿着这种静脉曲张袜能起到一定的缓解作用。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the value of color Doppler flow imaging (CDFI)in finding the reasons of lower extremity with venous engorgement (LEVE).
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨彩超在诊断下肢静脉曲张症原因中的价值。

sentences.english: Conclusions: Endovenous laser treatment for varicose great saphenous veins is effective and micro-traumatic.
sentences.chinese: 结论腔内激光治疗大隐静脉曲张效果确切，创伤小。

sentences.english: Bleeding esophageal varices may be the first manifestation of cirrhosis.
sentences.chinese: 出血性食管静脉曲张可能是肝硬化的首要表现。

sentences.english: You may also get varicose veins and swollen ankles from standing for a long period of time.
sentences.chinese: 你也会因为长时间站立导致静脉曲张和脚踝肿胀。

sentences.english: The presence of gastric varices has no influence on portal hypertensive gastropathy .
sentences.chinese: 胃静脉曲张对门脉高压性胃病无影响。
膝盖酸痛，腿上静脉曲张。

sentences.english: Is epididymitis able to arouse a varicocele?
sentences.chinese: 附睾炎会引起精索静脉曲张么？

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the electrocoagulation for varicose veins of the lower extremities.
sentences.chinese: 目的评价电凝法治疗下肢静脉曲张的方法及疗效。
